item.title: Taxonomic Study: Definition and Taxonomic Hierarchy
item.description:
Taxonomic Study: Definition and Taxonomic Hierarchy

Taxonomy is a crucial field in biology that involves the classification, naming, and identification of living organisms. This document provides an overview of the definition of taxonomy and the structure of the taxonomic hierarchy.

1. Definition of Taxonomy

Taxonomy is defined as the branch of biology that deals with the naming, describing, and classification of organisms. It provides a systematic framework for identifying and grouping species based on shared characteristics, facilitating communication and understanding in the biological sciences.
